page.title: 18THE PONTELAND VILLAGE FAIR
page.content: {Ponteland village fair}comes once a year. It is a good day out for the family if the weather stays fine. In 1983 a downpour sent everybody rushing for the large marquee.{Morris Dancers are a great attraction in the centre field of the fair.Judging of the fancy dress also takes place in the centre field.This year Paddy Mcdee of{Metro {Radio}is coming to open the fair.Last year{Eric Bristow}came in a helicopter to open the fair.The winner of the fancy dress got a ride in the helicopter. The{English Civil War {display team}were acting plays in the centre field, which were meant to be a replica of the Civil War. The fair is a great success for the{charities there.
